    <div class="mod" lang="en-KE" data-md="50" data-hveid="CAUQAA" data-ved="2ahUKEwitisOk3sbeAhUEXxoKHd2YDcUQkCkwGnoECAUQAA">
      <div class="hb8SAc kno-fb-ctx" data-hveid="CAUQAQ" data-ved="2ahUKEwitisOk3sbeAhUEXxoKHd2YDcUQziAoADAaegQIBRAB">
        <div class="r-i5tS6hPCMMWo">
          <div class="kno-rdesc r-ivbXMbFi6I00" data-t="kno-desc-sh" data-rtid="ivbXMbFi6I00">
            <div>
              Hernán Jorge Crespo is a retired Argentine footballer. A prolific striker, he has scored over 300 goals in a career spanning 19 years. At international level, Crespo scored 35 goals and is Argentina&#8217;s fourth highest goalscorer behind only Sergio Agüero, Gabriel Batistuta and Lionel Messi.
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
